content: contains control statements. When this step is reached, XEDIT opens and displays the contents of the IBM default values for the POOLDEF file, as shown in Figure 6-22 on page 241. ADMIN LNXMAINT MAINT MAINT720 FTPSERVE BACKUP FILEPOOLID LNX SAVESEGID CMSFILES REMOTE USERS 300 NOSHUTDOWNSIGNAL NODFSMS Chapter 6. Configuring z/VM 241 Figure 6-22 POOLDEF defaults with D in the prefix area of lines 9 and 10 8. Modifications are required. Enter D into the prefix area on lines 9 and 10 as shown in Figure 6-22 and press Enter. After you delete these two lines, save and exit: ====> file FILESERV GENERATE processing continues by using the control statements that you specified: DMS5FD3032I File pool server has terminated DMSWFV1120I File LNX POOLDEF A created or replaced DMSWFV1117I FILESERV processing ended at 17:18:11 on 10 Apr 2015 9.
